DOC.brief_title: High Dose Cholecalciferol Reduce Incidence Gestational Diabetes High Risk Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Determine effect increase vitamin D supplementation ( 4000 IU vitamin D3 +prenatal vitamin ) incidence gestational diabetes compare standard prenatal vitamin among pregnant woman high risk gestational diabetes . Explore effect increase vitamin D supplementation ( 4000 IU daily + prenatal vitamin ) , compare standard prenatal vitamin , glycemic control , need oral hypoglycemic agent and/or insulin , delivery outcomes among subset woman develop gestational diabetes .

Subject establish prenatal care later complete 12th week gestation ( 12 6/7 week ) 3 . Subject posse least one follow characteristic : 1 . BMI great equal 30 kg/m2 2 . History gestational diabetes prior pregnancy 3 . History infant birth weight 4500g great 4 . Subject capable give informed consent 1 . Age le 18 year 2 . Multiple gestation pregnancy ( twin , triplet great multiple ) 3 . Vitamin D deficiency ( define less 20 ng/mL ) 4 .
